channel.title: Theblackcat on Kage
channel.description: Recent content in Theblackcat on Kage

item.title: Writing Tools
item.description: Most people use computers to write nowadays, and that make a lot of sense. For me, though, writing on a computer is a bit difficult, I get bored and distracted very easily and in a computer, where the whole of the Internet is a click away, I am not able to be very productive… So I have decided to write my NaNoWriMo novel by hand! Seeing the letters form on the page, with some music on the background, seems to be enough to keep my brain entertained while I write, and the lack of distractions help a lot.

item.title: Cover and Synopsis
